definitions.title: n.m
definitions.body: :Is 34:6 slaughtering, slaughter—abs. ´[[ט]] Ge 43:16 + 6 t.; [[טָָבַח]] Ez Eze 21:20 + 3 t.; sf. [[טִבְחָהּ]] Pr 9:2; —

slaughtering, slaughter, of animals for food; as acc. cogn. after [[טָבַח]] (q. v.) Ge 43:16 (J), Pr 9:2; [[יוּבָָל]] ´[[כַּשֶּׂה לַטּ]] Is 53:7, sim. of suffering servant of ´[[י]]; also Pr 7:22 sim. of fatuousness of one following a strange woman, thoughtless of consequences; ´[[יֵרְדוּ לַטּ]] Je 50:27 metaph. of Babylonian leaders, under fig. of bullocks; so prob. Je 48:15, and perh. [[תִּכְרָָעוּ]] ´[[לַטּ]] Is 65:12.
in poet. fig. slaughter, to which the nations are given over by ´[[י]] Is 34:2, specif. of Edom v:Is 34:6 (‖[[זֶבַח]]; v. ´[[ז]]
p. 258:a); of Isr. Ez Eze 21:20, as acc. cogn. after [[טָבַח]] v:Eze 21:15; of Ammon v:Eze 21:28.
